DOC.brief_title: Norepinephrine Plus Dobutamine Versus Epinephrine Alone Management Septic Shock
DOC.detailed_description: The french Conference Consensus catecholamine use septic shock underline importance carry clinical trial clarify use epinephrine , norepinephrine dobutamine management multiple organ failure associate severe sepsis . The main objective study therefore compare effect combination dobutamine norepinephrine epinephrine alone patient septic shock . In purpose , patient randomly assign receive either epinephrine norepinephrine plus dobutamine drug titrate maintain blood pressure 70 mmHg . Main outcome 28-day mortality .
